# Insurans.co

> Malaysia's BM-first (Bahasa Malaysia) insurance guide with real prices, company comparisons, and practical guides. Written for ordinary Malaysians — not agents or brokers.

Insurans.co covers car insurance, motorcycle insurance, health insurance, life insurance, home insurance, personal accident insurance, and takaful (Islamic insurance) in Malaysia. The site includes premium estimates, NCD (No-Claim Discount) tables, company profiles for 12 major insurers, and step-by-step guides for claims and renewals. Content is primarily in Bahasa Malaysia with some English terms.

## Main Pages

- [Homepage](https://insurans.co/): Overview of all insurance types available in Malaysia with quick links to each category
- [Car Insurance](https://insurans.co/car-insurance/): Comprehensive car insurance guide — premium estimates by car model, NCD table, comparison of comprehensive vs third-party coverage. Most popular page.

## Insurance Types

- [Car Insurance](https://insurans.co/car-insurance/): Premium estimates (e.g. Myvi RM700–1000, Axia RM550–750 with 55% NCD), types of coverage, how premiums are calculated
- [Motorcycle Insurance](https://insurans.co/motorcycle-insurance/): Motorcycle insurance guide for Malaysia
- [Health Insurance](https://insurans.co/health-insurance/): Medical cards and health insurance plans in Malaysia
- [Life Insurance](https://insurans.co/life-insurance/): Term life, whole life, and investment-linked plans
- [Home Insurance](https://insurans.co/home-insurance/): Fire insurance and houseowner/householder policies
- [Personal Accident](https://insurans.co/personal-accident/): PA insurance covering accidental death, disability, and medical expenses
- [Takaful](https://insurans.co/takaful/): Shariah-compliant insurance alternative — how takaful works vs conventional insurance

## Company Profiles

12 insurance companies profiled with ratings, pros/cons, premium ranges, and key facts:

- [Etiqa](https://insurans.co/companies/etiqa/): Malaysia's most popular motor insurer (Maybank Group). Rating: 4.2/5
- [Allianz](https://insurans.co/companies/allianz/): German insurer with premium coverage options. Rating: 4.3/5
- [Tokio Marine](https://insurans.co/companies/tokio-marine/): Japanese insurer known for fast claims. Rating: 4.1/5
- [AIA](https://insurans.co/companies/aia/): Asia's largest life insurer, best for medical cards. Rating: 4.4/5
- [Great Eastern](https://insurans.co/companies/great-eastern/): Malaysia's oldest life insurer (est. 1908). Rating: 4.2/5
- [Zurich](https://insurans.co/companies/zurich/): Swiss insurer offering both conventional and takaful. Rating: 4.0/5
- [Prudential](https://insurans.co/companies/prudential/): UK insurer with excellent Pulse app. Rating: 4.3/5
- [Takaful Malaysia](https://insurans.co/companies/takaful-malaysia/): Malaysia's first takaful operator (est. 1984). Rating: 4.1/5
- [Berjaya Sompo (Kurnia)](https://insurans.co/companies/kurnia/): Formerly Kurnia — one of cheapest car insurers. Rating: 4.0/5
- [MSIG](https://insurans.co/companies/msig/): Japanese insurer popular for travel insurance. Rating: 4.0/5
- [RHB Insurance](https://insurans.co/companies/rhi/): Part of RHB Banking Group. Rating: 3.8/5
- [Lonpac](https://insurans.co/companies/lonpac/): Under Public Bank Group, highly profitable but low-profile. Rating: 3.9/5
- [All Companies](https://insurans.co/companies/): Full directory of insurance companies in Malaysia

## Guides

- [How to Claim Insurance](https://insurans.co/guides/how-to-claim/): Step-by-step guide for making insurance claims in Malaysia
- [Insurance vs Takaful](https://insurans.co/guides/insurance-vs-takaful/): Key differences between conventional insurance and takaful
- [NCD Explained](https://insurans.co/guides/ncd-explained/): No-Claim Discount system — how it works, NCD table (25%→30%→38.33%→45%→55%)
- [How to Renew Car Insurance](https://insurans.co/guides/renew-car-insurance/): Online and offline renewal process for Malaysian car insurance
